abstract: Few financial chief executives are under as much scrutiny or pressure as Citigroup’s Vikram S. Pandit. But the bank’s chairman, Richard D. Parsons, has a message for Mr. Pandit’s naysayers: Give him some credit.

headline.main: Parsons of Citigroup Says Pandit Deserves Credit

abstract: Apollo Global Management, the private equity firm led by Leon D. Black, said on Monday that it was seeking a $50 million initial public offering of shares as it seeks to migrate to the New York Stock Exchange from Goldman Sachs’s private market.
